scripts.dev: node scripts/normalize-images.mjs && node scripts/organize-posts.mjs && astro dev
scripts.build:raw: node scripts/normalize-images.mjs && node scripts/organize-posts.mjs && astro build
scripts.build: vitest run --exclude tests/build.test.mjs && node scripts/normalize-images.mjs && node scripts/organize-posts.mjs && astro build
